notifications.title: Introducing Redis 7.2
notifications.body:
Redis 7.2 brings memory and speed optimizations, encompasses a significant investment in the functionality that supports AI initiatives, and more.

New version introduces a broad set of new features, including Geo polygon queries for basic shapes in Search and Query, and the preview of triggers and functions to execute JavaScript code within the database.

notifications.title: RedisGraph End of Life
notifications.body:
Redis Inc. has announced the end-of-life of RedisGraph. We will carry out the process gradually, and in accordance with our commitment to our customers.

If you are using RedisGraph - please read the following carefully.

notifications.title: Missing a feature or found a bug?
notifications.body:
Would you like to see specific features added or have a bug to report?

Share it with us!

And star the repository if you like RedisInsight!
